title: As a fellow Puerto Rican, Bad Bunny's Super Bowl show was personal
summary_full: While the performance carried a message of unity for Latinos in general, the artist sang for the island we are both from, writes BBC Mundo's Ronald Ávila.
summary_public: While the performance carried a message of unity for Latinos in general, the artist sang for the island we are both from, writes BBC Mundo's Ronald Ávila.
